IP ADDRESS UBUNTU
==================

Silahkan di sesuaikan :
> cd /etc/netplan/
> nano /etc/netplan/50-cloud-init.yaml
> nano /etc/netplan/01-netcfg.yaml

# This file is generated from information provided by the datasource.  Changes
# to it will not persist across an instance reboot.  To disable cloud-init's
# network configuration capabilities, write a file
# /etc/cloud/cloud.cfg.d/99-disable-network-config.cfg with the following:
# network: {config: disabled}
network:
    ethernets:
        ens18:
            addresses:
            - 192.168.1.9/27
            nameservers:
                addresses:
                - 8.8.8.8
                - 203.142.82.222
                - 1.1.1.1
                search: []
            routes:
            -   to: default
                via: 192.168.1.1
    version: 2


Untuk menerapkan perubahan Netplan baru, jalankan:
> sudo netplan apply

*) Tanpa menjalankan ini, ketika server di restart pun tidak akan berubah.




Atau, jika Anda mengalami beberapa masalah, jalankan:
> sudo netplan --debug apply

Konfirmasikan alamat IP statis baru Anda dengan menggunakan ip a perintah:
> ip a
